thread.title: Great Location, Very Accommodating Staff!
thread.title_full: Great Location, Very Accommodating Staff! - Review of Executive Hotel LeSoleil, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sarah7023
title: Great Location, Very Accommodating Staff!
text: Hotel was modern and up-scale with a great location! Very close to Herald's Square for shopping, the Empire State Building was two blocks away and Times Square was within walking distance too. There was a very inviting fireplace in the sitting area of the lobby that was nice to enjoy in the evenings. Bellhop was very helpful in hailing a taxi for us. I would stay here again!
